abstractText: A 19th century Nepalese paper manuscript of the Nāmasaṅgīti. This manuscript is composite and consists of two codicological units ("There are 9 leaves of supply, the 8th‚ which occurs at 17, being inadvertently numbered 8"; Bendall 1883: 77).
abstractShort: A 19th century Nepalese paper manuscript of the Nāmasaṅgīti. This manuscript is composite and consists of two codicological
title: Nāmasaṅgīti
